nodes.text: Quirt's prison ship was an Imperial prisoner transport commanded by Colonel Quirt.

Quirt used the ship to gather up criminals on Formos and transport them to the spice mines of Kessel. It caught the Millennium Falcon as it attempted to escape Formos with a shipment of spice. Quirt was fooled by Han Solo and uncovered no spice nor the escaped Wookiee prisoner Hronk and subsequently let the ship go.
